meeting_info.location: Dallas City Hall, 6FN Conference Room and Videoconference

agenda_items.title: License Agreement
agenda_items.description: Authorize a five-year Licensed Training Provider Agreement with the American National Red Cross & Its Constituent Chapters and Branches dba American Red Cross to permit City of Dallas Park and Recreation Department Red Cross-certified instructors to use Red Cross licensed training materials in the instruction of water safety training courses.

agenda_items.title: Concession Contract
agenda_items.description: Authorize a five-year concessionaire contract for the operational management of a food and beverage concession service at the Kiest Softball Complex.

agenda_items.title: Trinity Strand Trail
agenda_items.description: Authorize Change Order No. 3 for a decrease in the construction services contract with RoeschCo Construction Inc. for the construction of the Trinity Strand Trail Phase II.

agenda_items.title: West Trinity Heights Park
agenda_items.description: Authorize the rescission of the authorization of a public hearing to be held on December 11, 2024, and a public hearing to be held on March 26, 2025, to receive comments on the proposed use of a portion of parkland at West Trinity Heights Park.

agenda_items.title: Land Acquisition
agenda_items.description: Authorize settlement in lieu of proceeding with condemnation, from A+ Charter Schools, Inc., of approximately 466,639 square feet of land for a proposed new park.

agenda_items.title: Kleberg Trail
agenda_items.description: Authorize a hike and bike trail easement with DART for use of DART property for construction, operation, and maintenance of a portion of the planned Kleberg Trail.

agenda_items.title: Trinity Strand Trail
agenda_items.description: Authorize a construction services contract for the construction of the Trinity Strand Hi-Line Span Project.

agenda_items.title: L.B. Houston Nature Area
agenda_items.description: Authorize a public hearing to be held on March 26, 2025, to receive comments on the proposed use of a portion of parkland at L. B. Houston Nature Area.

agenda_items.title: College Park Renaming
agenda_items.description: Discussion item regarding the renaming of College Park.

agenda_items.title: Contract Fee Instructors Program
agenda_items.description: Briefing item regarding the Contract Fee Instructors Program.

financial_items.description: License Agreement with American National Red Cross
Concession Contract at Kiest Softball Complex
Change Order for Trinity Strand Trail
Land Acquisition from A+ Charter Schools, Inc.
Construction services contract for Trinity Strand Hi-Line Span Project
Public hearing for L.B. Houston Nature Area
